person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Mubarak 's adviser Osama el-Baz said on Thursday there were efforts to arrange a meeting between the Israeli and Palestinian leaders .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|

| Osama el-Baz |
| Israeli leaders |
| Palestinian leaders |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

|--------|

(Note: In this context, "the Israeli and Palestinian leaders" refers to specific individuals who hold leadership roles in Israel and Palestine.)
